aka: BBC-失落的远古瑰宝-七大奇迹
this_title: Lost Treasures of the Ancient World: The Seven Wonders
trans_title: 失落的远古瑰宝：七大奇迹
BBC-失落的远古瑰宝-七大奇迹
introduction: This program presents the stories of the works of architecture regarded by the Greeks and Romans as the most extraordinary structures of antiquity: the Hanging Gardens of Babylon, The Statute Of Zeus, the Temple of Artemis, the Mausoleum of Halicarnassus, the Pharos of Alexandria and the Pyramids of Egypt and more.
chinese_title: 失落的远古瑰宝：七大奇迹
foreign_title: Lost Treasures of the Ancient World: The Seven Wonders
